original_text: The kings came and fought, then fought the kings of Canaan in Taanach by the waters of Megiddo; they took no gain of money.
korean_text: 왕들이 와서 싸울 때에 가나안 왕들이 므깃도 물 가 다아낙에서 싸웠으나 은을 탈취하지 못하였도다

sentences.original_text: then fought the kings of Canaan
in Taanach by the waters of Megiddo
they took no gain of money
